articles.title: Piers Morgan quits British TV program after Meghan Markle comments - Moneycontrol
articles.description: UK’s media watchdog said earlier that it was launching an investigation into the TV show under its harm and offense rules after receiving more than 41,000 complaints over Piers Morgan’s comments about Meghan Markle, the Duchess of Sussex.
articles.content:
British television host Piers Morgan on March 9 quit the Good Morning Britain program after making contentious comments about Meghan Markle following her bombshell interview about the royal family.
